channel.title: Ubuntu 7.10?
channel.description: Ok I have no clue how to use it... I downloaded it... then what??? All i get is this Sonic Digital stuff... What do I do now? I want to get Beryl too, how do I do that? D: Please help me. I DID use google, I dont get it. Please make a noob friendly tutorial on how to get/use Beryl & Ubuntu 7.10
